td.div: Our school provides in person education for students in kindergarten through 8th grade and online education for 5th-12th grade students

br.span:
Due to the Governor’s Executive Order to Stay At Home, we will be holding our regular meeting via Zoom. Current Open Meeting law also states that in the case of a pandemic, we do not need to have a person onsite at the regular meeting place. Therefore, the School Board Chair has decided to hold meetings electronically at least until the order is lifted. Below, you will find the login information to join the meeting. To prevent Zoombombing, we have added a password. The Board Chair will let participants in at the beginning of the meeting.
If you have an item for the public comment period, please email Lori Scharenbroich, Board Chair with your name and topic.

br.br:
Topic: Crosslake Community School Board Meeting April 13, 2020
Time: Apr 13, 2020 05:00 PM Central Time (US and Canada)
Join Zoom Meeting
https://crosslakekids.zoom.us/j/96739045291?pwd=dXFRd0tCUURnaW15ZWtub1hiQW5nQT09
Meeting ID: 967 3904 5291
Password: 0TMMgw

We did it!
​The building is done, but the work isn’t over. Please visit buildtheschool.org to see how you can be part of this magnificent community.​
